author: clement
msg: Add scoping features for service requirement resolving.

This feature can be used both for primitive component requirement and for composite requirement. A requirement can now be solved in the global (i.e. OSGi) service registry instead of inside the composite.

author: gkossakowski
msg: Moved initialization of ObjectModel to the place that guarantees that ObjectModel will be cleaned up properly.

author: gkossakowski
msg: Parameters are added to ObjectModel in FlowObjectModelHelper class instead of TemplateObjectModelHelper.
